entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is mentioned as the source of the lost diadem. The text states 'the lost diadem of Ravenclaw'.

entities.name: billywig wings
entities.description: Billywig wings are mentioned as an element that made a difference in re-creating the lost diadem. The text states 'Adding the billywig wings really made a diï¬€erence'.

entities.name: remus john lupin
entities.description: Remus John Lupin is mentioned as the person at the door. The text states 'It is I, Remus John Lupin!'

relationships.description: Bill jumped to his feet and pointed his wand at the door. The text states 'Bill jumped to his feed, his wand pointing at the door'.
Remus John Lupin is standing at the door. The text states 'It is I, Remus John Lupin!'
Bill recognizes Remus John Lupin at the door. The text states 'Who is it?' and then 'It is I, Remus John Lupin!'
